item.title: About me
item.description: About me Welcome! I am Xiantang. This is my personal website, where I blog about things I learn or think about in my daily life. I hope you like it. My personal telegram channel is https://t.me/xiantang. I like programming and can use many languages, such as: Golang https://github.com/cosmtrek/air is my main language currently. Scala https://github.com/xiantang/redislimiter I have written some services. Python https://github.com/xiantang/Spider I have written some crawlers. Java https://github.com/xiantang/JerryMouse I have written a simple web container.
